About Us
SolVPS specializes in high-performance Linux and Windows VPS hosting. Since 2013 we have been delivering the fastest VPS hosting available in the USA and UK, based on our high performance SSD hosting platform. Our guarantees include:

+ 24x7 Technical Support
Standing by around-the-clock to assist.

+ 30 Day Full Refund Guarantee
Covers all purchases. Terms that protect YOU.

+ 99.99% Uptime
Continuous uptime is guaranteed by our 99.99% SLA.


Supercharge your apps and services with SSD VPS hosting.
SSD VPS instances are connected to pure SSD storage arrays that power each VPS. Arrays utilize RAID10 storage-mirroring technology to maintain data parity and throughput performance. The key features of SSD VPS hosting are:
  • Drastically improved I/O availability for all applications
  • Storage read+write performance at speeds up to 2 GB/s
  • Improved overall system performance
  • Included with all of our VPS hosting packages

DATA CENTER LOCATIONS:

New York City, NY (Visit site to view USA VPS hosting speed test information)

Los Angeles, CA (Visit site to view LA VPS hosting speed test information)
